      • getUserById

        public HtmlMessage getUserById(java.lang.Integer userId)
        Returns a HtmlUserList that has the given userId. Returns a HtmlError if: - no userId is given - userId is not found
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user you wish to return.
        Returns:
        HtmlUserList success: true, users: list of size 1 with found user

      • getUserByUserName

        public HtmlMessage getUserByUserName(java.lang.String username)
        Returns a HtmlUserList that has the given username. Returns a HtmlError if: - no username is given - username is not found
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user you wish to return.
        Returns:
        HtmlUserList success: true, users: list of size 1 with found user

      • getUserByObject

        public HtmlMessage getUserByObject(User user)
        Returns a HtmlUserList that has the given user object. Returns a HtmlError if: - no username and no userId is given - username or userId is not found - user object is empty
        Parameters:
        user - User object containing username or userId of user you wish to return
        Returns:
        HtmlUserList success: true, users: list of size 1 with found user

        public HtmlMessage addUser(User user)

        Parameters:
        user - The user of the user you wish to add.
        Returns:
        HtmlUserList success: true, users: list of size 1 with found user

        Parameters:

      • userExists

        public boolean userExists(User user)
        returns if specified user's exists in db ONLY userId or username needs to be filled in the given user object
        Parameters:
        user - user to be checked
        Returns:
        if user is found or not

      • deleteUserById

        public HtmlError deleteUserById(java.lang.Integer userId)
        Returns a HtmlMessage of delete success. Returns a HtmlError if: - no userId is given - userId is not found
        Parameters:
        userId - The userId of the user you wish to delete.
        Returns:
        HtmlUserList success: true, users: list of size 0

      • requestFriendById

        public HtmlMessage requestFriendById(int userId,
                                     int friendId)
        Returns a HtmlMessage of request success Returns a HtmlError if: - no userId is given - no friendId is given - userId is not found - friendId is not found
        Parameters:
        userId - The userId to send a request from
        friendId - The friendId to send a request to
        Returns:
        HtmlUserList success: true, users: list size of 0 or HtmlError success: false, message: detailed error message

      • removeFriendById

        public HtmlMessage removeFriendById(int userId,
                                    int friendId)
        Returns a HtmlMessage of removed friend success Returns a HtmlError if: - no userId is given - no friendId is given - userId is not found - friendId is not found
        Parameters:
        userId - The userId to remove outgoing request
        friendId - The friendId to delete incoming request to
        Returns:
        HtmlUserList success: true, users: list size of 0 or HtmlError success: false, message: detailed error message

        Parameters:

        Returns:
